Articles.Content:
I've been toying with the idea of a stock V-22 osprey. I've made a rather bad version of it that will somewhat fly. You have to pull up hard after you run off the runway and keep correcting upwards. Also, if you wish to go down, you have to dip down below the horizon slowly or else it will enter an irrecoverable tumble. It has some extra parts to allow some form of flight. Can someone make a better version and share it?

Download: http://www./download/195l20hrajg292x/Osprey_1.craft
Looks inteesting-I'll see what I can do.
